I am an experienced Software Engineer who is passionate about building products that really solve for a customer need. I enjoy talking to customers, figuring out their needs, and building something that solves that problem in a delightful way.

Experience

Backend Engineer

Noom

Lead cross-functional team inside the international team to grow Noom's footprint from 1 language and 4 countries to 3 languages and 8 countries. Projects include integrating a 3rd part Translation Management System, selecting and building out a new Content Management System, and massively expanding the recipe database import thoroughput.

Software Development Engineer

Worked on AWS Cost Anomaly Detection and AWS Cost Scenario Simulation. Designed and built V1 for Cost Workload Simulator, allowing customers to model the effects of potential changes to their workloads.

September 2019 - July 2021

Software Engineering Intern

OpenTable

Implemented backend feature in C# to exclude certain parties from kitchen pacing requirements, allowing restaurants to better gauge operating capacity.

June 2018 - August 2018

Basketball Analytics Intern

Golden State Warriors

Created program to calculate stat translation between NBA, NCAA and European leagues for different player classifications. Designed proprietary metrics to analytically evaluate prospects for the 2018 NBA Draft. Identified projected UDFA's to target for signing.
